doc:
Francis Boggs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francis_Boggs 0 Francis Winter Boggs (March 1870 – October 27, 1911) was a stage actor and pioneer silent film director. He was one of the first to direct a film in Hollywood. Francis_Winter_Boggs ( March_1870 – October_27_,_1911 ) was a_stage_actor_and_pioneer_silent_film_director . He was one of the_first to_direct a_film in Hollywood .
